entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Activity id of nettrace events are always 0 #102411

Closed

  • How can I use IReadOnlySet in netstandard2.0? #102389
  • long.TryParse raises RuntimeBinderException (ambiguous call) #102414
  • Error ! .Net 8 Maui Cannot run some machines, but .Net 6 can run these machines, now you force update vs 2022 to use .net8 ,it give me big trouble！！！！！！！ #97516

PullRequests

Created

  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102413
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix flaky Json+Pipe test #102412
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Build against Y2038-compatible glibc for linux arm32 #102410

Merged

  • Use BinaryPrimitives for `ObjectDataBuilder` primitive emit logic #102394
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the definition of `RhGetCurrentThunkContext` #102395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Experimental changes to address sbrk failures on MT CI lanes #102383
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete DebugSymbols=true setting for the repo build #102392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup CoreLib CompatibilitySuppressions #102363
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Console.ReadKey should not throw when read returns 0 records #98684
    area-System.Console
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • DATAS tuning changes #102368
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Slow Ping #40989
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]After installing net9preview4SDK on the arm64OS, create the MStest project and run dotnet test. The generated log is x64. #40857

Updated

  • ILLink_links_simple_app_without_analysis_warnings_and_it_runs failing in 8.0.1xx #40882
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • NullReferenceException in Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.ProjectContext after broken restore #39316

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Refactor pipelines and add Installer jobs #40983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Issues

Updated

  • Open questions for `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #8130

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Nullable decimal comparison bug in dotnet 8.0.5 (SDK 8.0.300) #73510
  • New APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73330
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34917.78 #73568

Updated

  • Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #72124
  • All analyzers from assembly Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeStyle.Fixes failed to load: Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Method not found: 'Boolean Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol.get_IsParamsArray()'. #73508

PullRequests

Created

  • [17.10] Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73572
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Install .NET 9 Runtime on Single Machine CI #73571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report EnC warning when entry point is changed #73565
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'features/RefStructInterfaces' into 'main' #73567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Batch FAR window update messages to lower refresh overhead. #73534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #55784
  • PublishTrimmed causes a runtime error related to source generation #55783
  • "UseKestrel" does not work in docker. #55782
  • Blazor-Web-Initializers comment is not added to the DOM by blazor.web.js when the page is using SSR and the page is cached using Cloudflare #55781

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55596
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55777
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #55778
  • Perf improvement: mvc #55741
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55761
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55775

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Emulator/Android crashes when clicking a button (connected WCF service with NET MAUI for database) #22506
  • CarouselView change programmatically Position property or CurrentItem Property throw Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first.' #22504
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program File(x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #22502

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] Navigation Toolbar broken #18902

PullRequests

Created

  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    community ✨, area-controls-editor

Updated

  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [X] rename XFC to XC #22488
    area-xaml, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Some fixes I needed #22494
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Add switch to BlazorWebView to configure 'fire and forget' for Android Disposal #22496
    area-blazor
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception when `SELECT`ing `(x ? A : default(int?) >= B)` #33752
  • Invalid optimization of CASE-WHEN expressions #33751
  • Table splitting + ConcurrencyToken throws unexpected DBConcurrencyException #33750
  • Misleading exception text: FromSqlRaw returns “missing column” error for wrong column #33748

Closed

  • ###22SIDHU# #33753
  • SelectMany cannot be translated when manually defined. #33679
  • Testing: How is AssertQuery supposed to work #33742

PullRequests

Created

  • When creating the "missing column" error message, use the same (case insensitive) column name comparer used in field value retrieval #33749

Updated

  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
